<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Create Portfolio Projects for all the Projects if not exists. </description>
        <name>Create Portfolio Projects if not Exists</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var portfolioProject ;
var project = new GlideRecord('pm_project');
project.query();
while(project.next()){
    portfolioProject = new GlideRecord('pm_portfolio_project');
	portfolioProject.addQuery('pm_project', project.getValue('sys_id'));
	portfolioProject.query();
	if(!portfolioProject.next()){
	      gs.log("Portfolio Project not exists. Create new");
          var portfolioProjectNew = new GlideRecord('pm_portfolio_project');
	      portfolioProjectNew.initialize();
	      portfolioProjectNew.setValue('pm_project', project.getValue('sys_id'));
	      portfolioProjectNew.insert();
	      new ProjectPortfolioUtils().refreshProject(portfolioProjectNew);
     }
		
 }]]></script>
